mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.payment, t.payment_type paymentType, t.post_fee postFee, t.`status`, t.create_time createTime, t.payment_time paymentTime, t.consign_time consignTime, t.end_time endTime, t.close_time closeTime, t.user_id userId, t.user_note userNote FROM oms_order t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.`status` = #{status} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC

SELECT t.id itemId, p.`name` itemName, t.product_specs productSpecs, t.pic, t.price, o.num quantity FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_product_item t ON p.id = t.product_id LEFT JOIN oms_order_item o ON t.id = o.item_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
